mdRecord.dcterms:title: Stethoscope
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Becton-Dickinson [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Binaural stethoscope with rubber tubing marked "Fleischer Stehoscope, Medium, B-D". Believed to be owned by William Gay Chrisitan, 1889 graduate of the UVA School of Medicine and faculty member in Anatomy until 1905; he later taught at the Medical College of Virginia. [original]
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments and apparatus--Stethoscopes
